ModMetaData.name: RMC011.电器空闲时不消耗电力
ModMetaData.author: Thom Blair III
ModMetaData.description:
合集链接：http://bbs.3dmgame.com/thread-5842015-1-1.html
HugsLib is required. 需要HugsLib！
This makes many electrical machines use minimum possible power (1 watt) when not in use. In addition, many electrical machines from other mods should behave the same way. 这使得许多电器在不使用时消耗最小可能的功率(1瓦)。此外，对于大部分自其他mod的电器应该也会生效。
Fully save compatible. Can be added or removed at any time. Please report any errors. 存档兼容，可以随时添加和移除。
Credits: Thom Blair III (Idea for the mod and programming) Fluffy (Programming) Xen (Programming) NubsPixel (RePower B19 mod) Texel (original RePower A16 mod)
